DOC.brief_summary: This trial is conducted in Europe. The aim of this first human dose trial is to investigate the safety, tolerability, pharmacodynamic (the effect of the investigated drug on the body) and pharmacokinetic (exposure of the trial drug in the body) properties of NNC0148-0000-0287 (insulin 287) in a GIPETÂ® I tablet formulation in healthy subjects.
DOC.brief_title: A Trial Investigating the Safety, Tolerability, Pharmacokinetics and Pharmacodynamics of NNC0148-0000-0287 in Healthy Subjects
DOC.criteria: Body mass index 18.028.0 kg/m^2 Subject who is considered to be healthy based on the medical history, physical examination, and the results of vital signs, electrocardiogram (ECG) and clinical laboratory tests performed during the screening visit, as judged by the investigator Known or suspected hypersensitivity to trial products or related products Previous participation in this trial. Participation is defined as randomised Presence of clinically significant acute gastrointestinal symptoms (e.g. nausea, vomiting, heartburn or diarrhoea) within 2 weeks prior to dosing, as judged by the investigator Any chronic disorder or severe disease which, in the opinion of the investigator, might jeopardise subject's safety or compliance with the protocol
